img_above_text:
![Wukong LowerHollow 56.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/85/Wukong_LowerHollow_56.jpg)
When he begins to charge, you can still sprint out of the way, but you'll need to act fast.
img_below_text:
Spot dodging can also work here, and if you try to perform a Rock Solid Deflect, you'll be knocked backward, but he'll often stumble to the ground as well, letting you get up and get some hits in before he regains his footing.
Boar Bajie has a lot of wide swinging attacks to be wary of, often shifting his body weight to slam his head to the side or swing it upwards.
summary_promot:

When he begins to charge, you can still sprint out of the way, but you'll need to act fast."
        - Following Text: "Spot dodging can also work here, and if you try to perform a Rock Solid Deflect, you'll be knocked backward, but he'll often stumble to the ground as well, letting you get up and get some hits in before he regains his footing.
Boar Bajie has a lot of wide swinging attacks to be wary of, often shifting his body weight to slam his head to the side or swing it upwards."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a tense moment in a boss battle against "Zhu Bajie" in *Black Myth: Wukong*. The player character, wielding a glowing orange weapon, is positioned near a large stone structure amidst a dark, chaotic environment with debris flying. The health bar at the bottom indicates the boss's remaining health. The preceding and following text suggests this scene involves dodging or countering a charging attack, with opportunities to exploit the boss's recovery for counterattacks.
